## Science communication and data visualisation

I like to dabble in alternative science communication and data viz. approaches when I can. You can find outputs of those projects here.

-   [Scrollytelling experience](https://saadarif.github.io/BVW-LastDays/) for Last Days of *Aporia crataegi* project (best enjoyed on a desktop/laptop).
-   [Shiny app](https://8ltxdw-saad-arif.shinyapps.io/NonTimberForestProducts/) for sharing research results on impact of non-timber forest prdoucts on biodiversity in Indonesia. In colloboration with Dr. Marco Campera and the [Sustainable agroforestry group at Oxford Brookes](https://www.brookes.ac.uk/research/units/hls/groups/sustainable-agroforestry)
